title: Cannot even Load into game and I got a huge leaver buster
body:
Well just a few minutes ago I was queuing with some friends, and we get into the game and right when we leave champion select, the screen just stayed black. Did not see myself load in or any of my teammates loaded in. So I waited it out, a couple minutes later they are already in game. So I just tell them to remake. I only dodged once this week so it gave me a lower priority queue for 5 games with a 20 minute wait. Riot do not ban people who can't even load in. This is ridiculous. I {{item:3151}}  Everytime.


UPDATE: Trying to play my bot games to end this queue mess but I still cannot load into game. I just wanted to have fun after I came home from school. Someone please help. I cannot even play.

replies.body:
Disconnecting from a match negatively affects everyone in it, even if you didn't have negative intentions. This is a reason why the Leaverbuster treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be modified or removed. 

Not being able to connect to a match after champ select is most commonly caused by a poor connection to the server. I strongly recommend taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your network settings are up to spec.

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through those steps.
